Plot: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.
Title: The Ides of March
Writer: George Clooney (screenplay), Grant Heslov (screenplay), Beau Willimon (screenplay), Beau Willimon (play)
Actors: Ryan Gosling, George Clooney, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Paul Giamatti
tomatoConsensus: While not exactly exposing revelatory truths, The Ides of March is supremely well-acted drama that moves at a measured, confident clip.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 34 nominations.
